articles.content: The wait continues. 10 years after India last laid their hands on an ICC Trophy, the World Cup 2023 was the perfect setting to end this long barren run. And they almost did. Almost, being the heartbr… [+10805 chars]

articles.title: Talented Head's strokeplay will help him become a great player: Virender Sehwag - Cricbuzz
articles.description: Travis Head was adjudged POTM in the semi-final & final of the World Cup. What makes the batter so good? Virender Sehwag & Ashish Nehra discuss, on Cricbuzz ...

articles.title: Arsène Wenger completes landmark visit to India to help unlock country's potential - FIFA.com
articles.description: FIFA Chief of Global Football Development Arsène Wenger has visited India to kick off the ground-breaking Talent Development Scheme (TDS) in the world’s most populous nation, a significant moment in FIFA’s efforts to grow the game and raise standards.
